page.title: 03SHOPS IN FLITWICK 2.
page.content: THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT SHOPS IN FLITWICK. PEOPLE COME QUITE LONG DISTANCES TO SHOP IN FLITWICK, FOR EXAMPLE AS FAR AWAY AS LONDON, SILSOE, PULLOXHILL, MAULDEN, FLITTON AND KENT .THERE ARE 36 SHOPS IN FLITWICK.THEY INCLUDE THESE TYPES: {FOOD SHOPS }E.G. SEARS BUTCHERS. {HYPERMARKET. }E.G. TESCO. {GENERAL STORES.}E.G. MACE, SPAR. {SERVICES.}E.G.HAIRDRESSERS,OPTICIANS. {SPECIALISTS.}E.G. SPORTS,ELECTRICAL. {NEWSAGENTS/SWEET SHOPS.}E.G. FLITWICK {NEWS CENTRE. }COFFEE CUP. MOST PEOPLE FEEL FLITWICK HAS ADEQUATE SHOPPING FACILITIES, ALTHOUGH SOME COMMENTS WERE MADE ABOUT THE LACK OF THE FOLLOWING: LEISURE FACILITIES, SHOE SHOPS, CLOTHES SHOPS AND PUBLIC TOILETS. FLITWICK PEOPLE ALSO GO SHOPPING IN BEDFORD, DUNSTABLE, LUTON AND MILTON KEYNES
